name: Garden Guardians
description:
Getting started System requirements
  • OS: Windows 10
  • RAM: 2GB
Instructions
  • You will start with a number of stars (Currency). You can spend it on your helpers to attack the enemies
  • Spend your currency on range defenders, like the gnome
  • Spend your currency on melee defenders, like the stone
  • Survive for a limited period of time
Controls

Mouse only. Click on the image of the defender you want to spawn and then click on the place you want to spawn it.

Acknowledgments

Thanks to Glitch.com for the assets. Long live the glitch!
